summary: syntax for Intel Network Processor Microcode
name: uc.vim
description: syntax color file for Intel Network Processor Microcode
install_details:
in the distribution, place the downloaded uc.vim in your syntax directory (e.g. on windows vimfiles/syntax or on unix .vim/syntax).

Create a file "filetype.vim" which contains an autocommand for your filetype.
(Autocommands were explained in section |40.3|.)  Example: >

	augroup filetypedetect
	au BufNewFile,BufRead *.uc setf uc
	augroup END

versions.release_notes: fix bug that Number not perporly colored in comments

add options manipulate the syntax:
uc_comment_strings	strings and numbers inside a comment
uc_space_errors		trailing white space and spaces before a <Tab>
uc_no_trail_space_error	 ... but no trailing spaces
uc_no_tab_space_error	 ... but no spaces before a <Tab>
uc_no_bracket_error	don't highlight {}; inside [] as errors

add syntax color for transfer register
fix some misconfig
uc_no_if0		don't highlight "#if 0" blocks as comments

Intel MicroCode
add syntax color for register variable
